sentences.en: But does not necessarily connote dishonesty, insincerity, or trickery.
sentences.cn: 有可能——但是并不必然地——意味着不诚实， 不诚心或欺骗。

sentences.en: Fraud and trickery still exist despite repeated bans.
sentences.cn: 这种弄虚作假的现象屡禁不绝.

sentences.en: He is suspected of employing trickery.
How could one be sure that it was simple trickery?
sentences.cn: 你怎么能确定这只不过是个小手法 呢 ?

sentences.en: I am only able to see through his trickery today!
sentences.cn: 我到现在才看出他的把戏!

sentences.en: I am only better than him through trickery and he meant me no harm.
sentences.cn: 我不过靠了诡计才比它强的,可它对我并无恶意.

sentences.en: Instead of a gun or knife, fraudsters use deception, confidence, and trickery.
sentences.cn: 欺诈者使用的工具不是枪或刀, 而是骗术 、 自信和诡计.

sentences.en: Neither trickery nor coercion is used to secure confessions.
No steel rods, no magnets, no computer trickery.
sentences.cn: 那里没有钢条、没有磁铁也没有电脑欺骗。

sentences.en: Rooney tormented the Latics with little explosions of speed and trickery.
sentences.cn: 鲁尼用自己的速度和假动作折磨着对手.

sentences.en: Stylised white studio photographs of modern dancers, involving much clever technical trickery.
sentences.cn: 别具风格的黑白照片工作室的现代舞者, 涉及许多聪明的技术弄虚作假.

sentences.en: There is a smell of trickery about it.
They were looked down upon due to their political trickery.
sentences.cn: 由于他们玩弄权术而被人们瞧不起.

sentences.en: To ensnare or prevail over with trickery.
sentences.cn: 诈骗用诡计使相信或说服.

sentences.en: To procure ( sailors or soldiers ) by trickery or coercion.
sentences.cn: 强行征兵通过诱骗或强制手段获得 ( 水手或士兵 )

sentences.en: Yet there is no cheating involved in any of the photographs. No steel rods, no magnets, no computer trickery. The only glue he uses is Nature's. Gravity.
sentences.cn: 然而，其中任何一张照片都没有涉及到欺骗。那里没有钢条、没有磁铁也没有电脑欺骗。他使用的唯一粘合剂是大自然的重力。

words.tran_cn: 特技的；欺诈的；有决窍的
欺骗的，狡猾的；恶作剧的；顽皮的
诡计；恶作剧；窍门；花招；骗局；欺诈
诡计多端；狡猾；棘手；欺骗

trans.tran_en: the use of tricks to deceive or cheat people
